[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@positron/use-prefixed-props](./use-prefixed-props.md)

## use-prefixed-props package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isPrefixedKey(key, prefix)](./use-prefixed-props.isprefixedkey.md) | Checks if the passed string <code>key</code> has the specified <code>prefix</code> |
|  [usePrefixedProps(props, prefixes)](./use-prefixed-props.useprefixedprops.md) | Extract properties prefixed by the specified <code>prefixes</code> |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [OmitPrefixed](./use-prefixed-props.omitprefixed.md) | Construct a type with the properties of <code>TProps</code> except for those which has prefix <code>TPrefix</code> (string literal). |
|  [OmitPrefixedArray](./use-prefixed-props.omitprefixedarray.md) | Construct a type with the properties of <code>TProps</code> except for those which has prefixes specified by <code>TPrefixes</code> (a tuple of string literals). |
|  [PickPrefixed](./use-prefixed-props.pickprefixed.md) | Constructs a type by picking the set of properties with prefix specified by <code>TPrefix</code> (string literal) from <code>TProps</code>. |
|  [PickPrefixedArray](./use-prefixed-props.pickprefixedarray.md) | Constructs a tuple type by picking the sets of properties with the prefixes specified by <code>TPrefixes</code> (a tuple of string literals) from <code>TProps</code>. |
|  [Prefix](./use-prefixed-props.prefix.md) | Prefix type |
|  [Prefixed](./use-prefixed-props.prefixed.md) | Construct a type by adding to the all string keys of <code>TProps</code> the prefix specified by <code>TPrefix</code> (string literal) |
|  [PrefixedKey](./use-prefixed-props.prefixedkey.md) | Construct a string type by adding the specified <code>TPrefix</code> (string literal) to the given <code>TKey</code> (string literal) |
|  [PrefixedProps](./use-prefixed-props.prefixedprops.md) | Constructs a tuple type of <code>TProps</code> without specified <code>TPrefixes</code> and picked prefixed properties for each prefix specified by the <code>TPrefixes</code>. This is a return type of hook [usePrefixedProps()](./use-prefixed-props.useprefixedprops.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [UnprefixedKey](./use-prefixed-props.unprefixedkey.md) | Returns a string literal type by stripping the specified <code>TPrefix</code> from literal <code>TKey</code> or <code>never</code> if <code>TKey</code> is not prefixed by the <code>TPrefix</code> |
